name: ClubPenguin.exe
description:
xX_KillerPenguin_Xx has hacked the Club Penguin server and changed it to its style. Now he is banning anyone who fails to overcome his challenge and leave his house of terror. Will you be his next victim?  This is probably the gorest game i ever made, lol.

Controls:

WSAD - MOVE
SHIFT - RUN
E - INTERACT
